title: Effects of subcutaneous vs. oral nanoparticle-mediated insulin delivery on hemostasis disorders in type 1 diabetes: A rat model study
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Nawel Kaddour, Farah Benyettou, Kawtar Moulai, Abdelouahab Mebarki, Katia Allal-Taouli, Rose Ghemrawi, Jamie Whelan, Hafida Merzouk, Ali Trabolsi, Nassima Amel Mokhtari-Soulimane
